header: The Men Who Guarded the Gates

verse: Here are the groups of men who guarded the gates.

All of them belonged to the family line of Obed-Edom. They and their sons and relatives were capable men. They were strong enough to do their work. The total number of men in the family line of Obed-Edom was 62.
Meshelemiah’s sons and relatives were capable men. Their total number was 18.
Those were the groups of the men who guarded the gates. They belonged to the family lines of Korah and Merari.

Men were in charge of the treasures in the house of God. They were the Levite relatives of the men who guarded the gates. These men were also in charge of other treasures that had been set apart for God.
Ladan was from the family line of Gershon. Some leaders of families belonged to Ladan’s family line. One of them was Jehieli.
The sons of Jehieli were Zetham and his brother Joel. They were in charge of the treasures in the Lord’s temple.
Here are the officials who were from the family lines of Amram, Izhar, Hebron and Uzziel.
